This will be my last post till monday. Its 11:50pm here.


::Dark/Liono/Killfest::

Liono sees Motormaster flying down to trap his brother, stopping his 
treck toward the Ark. He takes out his flame thrower, firing three 
fireballs at Motormaster.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest fires another missile at Dark, not seeing Motormaster flying 
down toward Dark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark avoids Motormaster's hands, flying upward. Seconds before 
hitting Motormaster, Killfest's missile also turns upward, following 
Dark.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The smoke finally clearing, Motormaster sees his target escaping, 
then sees
> one turned, the one that shot him in the back, his eyes flaring at 
Dark
> Convoy. He soars towards him and tries to grab his arms, to hold 
him in
> positiong for Killfest.
